title: Client Onboarding - Handover to Service Desk
description: The onboarding project for a new client is complete, and a formal handover meeting is held with the service desk team.

tasks.description: The onboarding project manager schedules the handover meeting.
During the meeting, the onboarding team walks the service desk team through the client's environment, documentation, and any special procedures.
tasks.expected_outcome: The service desk team is fully briefed on the new client.

tasks.description: The client's status in the PSA is officially changed to 'Managed', and they are now supported by the service desk.
